word: H3320 - יָצַב - yâtsab - yaw-tsab' - Present selves

sections.paragraph: to place, to set, to stand, to set or station oneself, to present oneself (Hithpael) to station oneself, to take one's stand, to stand, to present oneself, to stand with someone

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to place (any thing so as to stay); reflexively to station, offer, continue: - present selves, remaining, resort, set (selves), (be able to, can, with-) stand (fast, forth, -ing, still, up).
